sentences.sContent: What you should not do is prevent or override it unnecessarily.
sentences.sContent_eng: What you should not do is prevent or override it unnecessarily.
sentences.sCn: 您不应该做的是不必要地阻止或重写它。

sentences.sContent: An awful lot of people with depression suffer unnecessarily because of a fear of using medication, but it can be very effective.
sentences.sContent_eng: An awful lot of people with depression suffer unnecessarily because of a fear of using medication, but it can be very effective.
sentences.sCn: 一个可怕的抑郁症的人很多遭受不必要的，因为使用药物的恐惧，但它可以是非常有效的。

sentences.sContent: This will only eat up memory unnecessarily.
sentences.sContent_eng: This will only eat up memory unnecessarily.
sentences.sCn: 这样只会不必要地消耗内存。

words.tran: 不必要的；多余的，无用的
